subject: Seventh Promise
content: Carrie,/r/nnearly four years ago, we both made six promises. /r1. We would not laugh at each other. /r2. We never tell anyone our secrets. /r3. We never tickle each other. /r4. We never hit below the belt. /r5. We will never try to change one another. And finally,/r6. We never stop loving each other./r/nI think we should add another to this list of promises. That you promise to be my wife and share our love with the rest of the world.
